name: Sugar * Style
description:
Sugar * Style is a Japanese-style visual novel produced by Smee, a Japanese developer of romance VNs.



This is going to be the springtime of my life!
A little while back, a scam artist got the best of my parents and put my family deep in debt. We had to skip town, and my future was looking iffy at best. But thanks to a kind relative, I got into a vocational school

"Finally, I can really enjoy life!"

I arrived at the Sunshine Dorm with hope blooming in my heart.
Turns out, it was a homey place full of girls, girls, girls!

This has to be where I'll meet the love of my life!

But the joy of being surrounded by hotties lasted only a moment. Before I knew it, they all distrusted me because I was the only guy! Well, I'm not giving up yet! I swear, I'm gonna make this year one to remember!
